name: Puzzle King
description:
From the creator of Bubble Mania, Word Cafe and Wood Block Puzzle Classic comes the newest ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Puzzle King is a collection of the most addictive logic puzzle games!

It merges best puzzles like Link Dots, Rolling Ball and Hexa, with thousands of unique and challenging levels, unwind and sharpen your logic skills

Some puzzles in "Puzzle King" collections:

Rolling Ball
Rolling Ball is a unique thought-provoking brain teaser inspired by slide puzzles. Move the tiles to form a path that connects the blue and red tiles with 3 stars and watch the ball rolling. Unlock the fun now!

Hexa
Hexa is as simple yet extremely addicting puzzle game. The goal is to complete the entire board by dragging pieces. Blocks can´t be rotated, and the board changes every level, with different number of rows and columns each time.

Link Dots
Find a way to connect all the dots in a single line. Start connecting two dots and you will get addicted immediately to this brain stimulating puzzle game.


FEATURES
• Tons of interesting levels
Over thousands of free levels inside and more funny levels are on their way.

• Easy but Funny gameplay
We only put best puzzles inside! Once you start playing, you’ll find infinite fun!

• Playing the game with your friends and family
You can compete with your friends by leaderboard! Go challenge yourself!

• No need to rush
Unlike match 3 games, Puzzle King has no time limit. You can play it anytime even with no WIFI. You can use hints to unblock obstacles when things become too challenging.

If you have some good ideas about Puzzle King, please contact us via email in the game!
